skill.name: Fists of Thunder
skill.description:
Generate: 14 Spirit per attack

Teleport to your target and unleash a series of extremely fast punches that deal 200% weapon damage as Lightning.

Every third hit deals 400% weapon damage as Lightning split between all enemies in front of you.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 14 Spirit per attack

Teleport to your target and attack it with a series of rapid punches.

rune.name: Quickening
rune.description:
Increase Spirit generated to 20.

Fists of Thunder's damage turns into Physical.
rune.simpleDescription:
Increase Spirit generated.

Fists of Thunder's damage turns into Physical.

skill.name: Blinding Flash
skill.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Create a flash of light that blinds all enemies within 20 yards for 3 seconds. Elite enemies recover faster, but suffer a 30% chance to miss with attacks.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Blind all nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

rune.name: Replenishing Light
rune.description: Each enemy you Blind restores 10 Spirit.
rune.simpleDescription: Each enemy you Blind restores Spirit.

skill.name: Mystic Ally
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Active: Your mystic ally has its damage increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side. The ally deals 130% of your weapon damage as Physical per swing. When the ally dies, it is reborn after 5 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Active: Your mystic ally has its damage increased for a short duration.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side.

rune.name: Air Ally
rune.description:
Active: You gain 100 Spirit.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side that increases your Spirit Regeneration by 4.
rune.simpleDescription:
Active: You gain a burst of Spirit.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side that increases your Spirit Regeneration.

skill.name: Dashing Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash up to 50 yards, striking enemies along the way for 370% weapon damage as Physical.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash and strike enemies.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.

rune.name: Radiance
rune.description:
Gain 15% increased attack speed for 4 seconds after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Fire.
rune.simpleDescription:
Gain increased attack speed after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Fire.

skill.name: Mantra of Healing
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: Shroud you and your allies with a mystical shield that absorbs up to 62064 damage for 3 seconds. Absorb amount is increased by 15% of your Health Globe Healing Bonus.

Passive: You and your allies within 60 yards gain 10728 increased Life regeneration. The heal amount is increased by 7% of your Life per Second.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: Shroud you and your allies with a mystical shield that absorbs damage.

Passive: You and nearby allies gain increased Life regeneration.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.

rune.name: Circular Breathing
rune.description: Passive: Mantra of Healing also regenerates 3 Spirit per second.
rune.simpleDescription: Passive: Mantra of Healing also regenerates Spirit.

skill.name: Epiphany
skill.description:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second by 20 and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.

rune.name: Insight
rune.description: Increases the bonus Spirit regeneration from Epiphany to 45.
rune.simpleDescription: Increases the bonus Spirit regeneration from Epiphany.

skill.name: Momentum
skill.description: Moving 25 yards increases your damage by 20% for 6 seconds.
skill.flavor: Always in motion, flowing like water.

skill.name: Exalted Soul
skill.description:
Increase maximum Spirit by 50 and increase Spirit Regeneration by 4 per second.

Spirit fuels your defensive and offensive abilities.
skill.flavor: "Endeavor to be one with the hidden truth and you will soar beyond the sky." â€”Waykeeper Tzo Krin

skill.name: Harmony
skill.description: 40% of your single elemental resistances from items instead increases your resistance to all elements.
skill.flavor: Ice hunters brave months of frozen darkness. Desert traders bear relentless, scorching sun. This world is ours to endure.

skill.name: Chant of Resonance
skill.description: The Spirit costs of Mantra activation effects are reduced by 50% and you gain 4 Spirit every second when you have a Mantra learned.
skill.flavor: The world continues on the noble path, each of us carrying another, all connected, ever onward.

mainHand.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

skill.name: Heal
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar for 193112 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar.

skill.name: Loyalty
skill.description: Regenerates 6437 Life per second for you and the Templar.
skill.simpleDescription: Provides Life regeneration for you and the Templar.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Inspire
skill.description:
Increases your resource generation.

Mana: 7 per second.
Hatred: 1 per second.
Wrath: 1.1 per second.
Arcane Power: 1.4 per second.
Fury: 10% generated.
Spirit: 10% generated.

skill.name: Crippling Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that deals 140% weapon damage and slows enemies hit by 80% for 4 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that slows enemies.

skill.name: Vanish
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

The Scoundrel vanishes in a cloud of smoke when injured, reappearing after 4 seconds. While vanished, he will heal himself for 268211 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

The Scoundrel temporarily vanishes when in danger.

skill.name: Powered Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Ranged attack that explodes on impact, dealing 310% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies within 10 yards and has a 100% chance to Stun enemies for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Deals damage in an area that has a chance to Stun enemies.

skill.name: Hysteria
skill.description: Whenever you or the Scoundrel land a Critical Hit, you both will go into hysterics, increasing all damage done by 3% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription: Critical Hits cause you and the Scoundrel to temporarily deal more damage.
